books.author: by Prince Harry
books.description: The Duke of Sussex details his struggles with the royal family, loss of his mother, service in the British Army and marriage to Meghan Markle.
books.name: SPARE

books.author: by Jennette McCurdy
books.description: The actress and filmmaker describes her eating disorders and difficult relationship with her mother.
books.name: I'M GLAD MY MOM DIED

books.author: by Bessel van der Kolk
books.description: How trauma affects the body and mind, and innovative treatments for recovery.
books.name: THE BODY KEEPS THE SCORE

books.author: by Mike Pompeo
books.description: The former secretary of state gives his account of his time serving under President Trump, with a focus on an America First approach.
books.name: NEVER GIVE AN INCH

books.author: by Michelle Obama
books.description: The former first lady shares personal stories and the tools she uses to deal with difficult situations.
books.name: THE LIGHT WE CARRY

books.author: by Brad Meltzer and Josh Mensch
books.description: The story of a Nazi plot to kill President Roosevelt, Joseph Stalin and Winston Churchill.
books.name: THE NAZI CONSPIRACY

books.author: by Stephen A. Smith
books.description: The ESPN analyst recounts the highs and lows of his life and career.
books.name: STRAIGHT SHOOTER

books.author: by Matthew Perry
books.description: The actor, known for playing Chandler Bing on “Friends,” shares stories from his childhood and his struggles with sobriety.
books.name: FRIENDS, LOVERS, AND THE BIG TERRIBLE THING

books.author: by bell hooks
books.description: The late feminist icon explores the causes of a polarized society and the meaning of love.
books.name: ALL ABOUT LOVE

books.author: by Robin Wall Kimmerer
books.description: A botanist and member of the Citizen Potawatomi Nation espouses having an understanding and appreciation of plants and animals.
books.name: BRAIDING SWEETGRASS

books.author: by Richard Haass
books.description: The president of the Council on Foreign Relations makes his case for what he considers obligations for American citizens.
books.name: THE BILL OF OBLIGATIONS

books.author: by Johann Hari
books.description: Potential causes for diminishing attention spans and how corporations might raid our attention for profit.
books.name: STOLEN FOCUS

books.author: edited by Nikole Hannah-Jones, Caitlin Roper, Ilena Silverman and Jake Silverstein
books.description: Viewing America’s entanglement with slavery and its legacy, in essays adapted and expanded from The New York Times Magazine.
books.name: THE 1619 PROJECT

books.author: by the Select Committee to Investigate the Jan. 6 Attack on the United States Capitol
books.description: The final report of the Select Committee to Investigate the Jan. 6. Attack on the United States Capitol; with a preface by David Remnick and epilogue by Representative Jamie Raskin.
books.name: THE JANUARY 6TH REPORT

books.author: by Bono
books.description: The lead singer of the Irish rock band U2 offers details of his life, career and activism.
books.name: SURRENDER
